summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2390, for the improvement of Fillmore Street, in the City of Seattle, from Franklin Avenue North westward to the shore line of Lake Union, by grading and curbing the same, and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 24850 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
